function.name: ClearAllPoints
function.summary: Clears all attachment points for this object.

function.name: GetAlpha
function.summary: Gets the alpha level of this object.

function.name: GetBottom
function.summary: Gets the bottom location of the object.

function.name: GetCenter
function.summary: Gets the center location of the object.

function.name: GetHeight
function.summary: Gets the height of this object.

function.name: GetLeft
function.summary: Gets the x location of the left edge of this object.

function.name: GetName
function.summary: Gets the name of the object.

function.name: GetNumPoints
function.summary: Returns the number of anchor points.

function.name: GetObjectType
function.summary: Return the object type for this object.

function.name: GetParent
function.summary: Return the parent of this object.

function.name: GetPoint
function.summary: Get an attachment point of this object.

function.name: GetRight
function.summary: Gets the x location of the right edge of this object.

function.name: GetTop
function.summary: Get the y location of the top edge of this object.

function.name: GetWidth
function.summary: Gets the width of this object.

function.name: Hide
function.summary: Sets this object to hidden.

function.name: IsObjectType
function.summary: Determines whether the object is of the specified type.

function.name: IsShown
function.summary: Determines if this object is shown.

function.name: IsVisible
function.summary: Gets the visible state of this object.

function.name: SetAllPoints
function.summary: Sets all attachment points for this object.

function.name: SetAlpha
function.summary: Sets the alpha level of this object.

argument.name: alphaLevel
argument.summary: The new alpha level for this object.

function.name: SetHeight
function.summary: Sets the height of this object.

argument.name: height
argument.summary: The new height of this object.

function.name: SetParent
function.summary: Sets the parent of this object.

function.name: SetPoint
function.summary: Sets an attachment point of this object.

argument.name: point
argument.summary: The point to attach the object to

argument.name: parent
argument.summary: The name of the object to attach to

argument.name: relativePoint
argument.summary: The point on the parent to attach to

argument.name: x
argument.summary: The X offset of the attachment point

argument.name: y
argument.summary: The Y offset of the attachment point

function.name: SetWidth
function.summary: Sets the width of this object.

argument.name: width
argument.summary: The new width of this object.

function.name: Show
function.summary: Sets this object to visible.

function.name: CreateFontString
function.summary: Creates a new FontString object as a child of this Frame.

function.name: CreateTexture
function.summary: Creates a new Texture object as a child of this Frame.

function.name: DisableDrawLayer
function.summary: Disables a draw layer.

function.name: EnableDrawLayer
function.summary: Enables a draw layer.

function.name: EnableKeyboard
function.summary: Enables/disables the keyboard for this frame.

function.name: EnableMouse
function.summary: Enables/disables the mouse for this frame.

function.name: EnableMouseWheel
function.summary: Enables/disables the mousewheel for this frame.

function.name: GetAlpha
function.summary: Gets the alpha level of this frame.

function.name: GetBottom
function.summary: Get the y location of the bottom edge of this frame.

function.name: GetCenter
function.summary: Get the coordinates of the center of this frame.

function.name: GetChildren
function.summary: Get children of this frame.

function.name: GetEffectiveScale
function.summary: Get the scale factor of this object relative to the root window.

function.name: GetFrameLevel
function.summary: Get the level of this frame.

function.name: GetFrameStrata
function.summary: Get the strata of this frame.

function.name: GetFrameType
function.summary: Get the type of this frame.

function.name: GetID
function.summary: Get the id of this frame.

function.name: GetLeft
function.summary: Get the x location of the left edge of this frame.

function.name: GetNumChildren
function.summary: Get the number of children this frame has.

function.name: GetNumRegions
function.summary: Get the number of regions this frame has.

function.name: GetParent
function.summary: Get the parent of this frame.

function.name: GetRegions
function.summary: Gets all the regions of this frame.

function.name: GetRight
function.summary: Get the x location of the right edge of this frame.

function.name: GetScale
function.summary: Get the scale factor of this object relative to its parent.

function.name: GetScript
function.summary: Get the function for one of this frame's handlers.

function.name: GetTop
function.summary: Get the y location of the top edge of this frame.

function.name: HasScript
function.summary: Determines if the frame has the specified handler.

function.name: IsFrameType
function.summary: Determine if this frame is of the specified type, or a subclass of that type.

function.name: IsMovable
function.summary: Determine if the frame can be moved.

function.name: IsResizable
function.summary: Determine if the frame can be resized.

function.name: IsUserPlaced
function.summary: Determine if the frame has been relocated by the user.

function.name: Lower
function.summary: Lower this frame behind other frames.

function.name: Raise
function.summary: Raise this frame above other frames.

function.name: RegisterEvent
function.summary: Indicate that this frame should be notified when event occurs.

argument.name: eventName
argument.summary: The name of the event to register.

function.name: RegisterForDrag
function.summary: Indicate that this frame should be notified of drag events for the specified buttons.

function.name: SetAllPoints
function.summary: Sets all attachment points for this frame.

function.name: SetBackdrop
function.summary: Set the backdrop of the frame according to the specification provided.

function.name: SetBackdropBorderColor
function.summary: Sets the frame's backdrop's border's color.

function.name: SetBackdropColor
function.summary: Sets the frame's backdrop color.

function.name: SetFrameLevel
function.summary: Sets the frame's level.

function.name: SetFrameStrata
function.summary: Sets the frame's strata.

function.name: SetID
function.summary: Sets the frame's id.

function.name: SetMaxResize
function.summary: Set the maximum dimensions this frame can be resized to.

function.name: SetMinResize
function.summary: Set the minimum dimensions this frame can be resized to.

function.name: SetMovable
function.summary: Set whether the frame can be moved.

function.name: SetParent
function.summary: Set the parent for this frame.

function.name: SetResizable
function.summary: Set whether the frame can be resized.

function.name: SetScale
function.summary: Set the scale factor of this frame relative to its parent.

function.name: SetScript
function.summary: Set the function to use for a handler on this frame.

function.name: SetUserPlaced
function.summary: Set whether the frame has been relocated by the user.

function.name: StartMoving
function.summary: Start moving this frame.

function.name: StartSizing
function.summary: Start sizing this frame using the specified anchor point.

function.name: StopMovingOrSizing
function.summary: Stop moving or resizing this frame.

function.name: UnregisterAllEvents
function.summary: Indicate that this frame should no longer be notified when any events occur.

function.name: UnregisterEvent
function.summary: Indicate that this frame should no longer be notified when event occurs.

argument.name: eventName
argument.summary: The name of the event to register.
